name: BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.properties
description: The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.properties read-only property returns a BluetoothCharacteristicProperties instance containing the properties of this characteristic.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

TheBluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.properties read-only property returns a BluetoothCharacteristicProperties instance containingthe properties of this characteristic.
